text: Koiindanga Pathien'n hi mingei hih an mun chita a dar ngeia: inkhatna tîrtonngei, inikna dêipungei, inthumna minchupungei; masuole chu sininkhêl sinpungei, mindam theina ranak dônpungei, mi san theina ranak dônpungei, roijêk theina ranak dônpungei le rietloi chonga thurchi misîr theina manboipêk changpungei hah an ni.12:28: Eph 4:11
